channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiDeceptor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiDeceptor

item.title: CVE-2020-6644|2024-08-04T09:11:04.476Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortideceptor
item.description: An insufficient session expiration vulnerability in FortiDeceptor 3.0.0 and below allows an attacker to reuse the unexpired admin user session IDs to gain admin privileges, should the attacker be able to obtain that session ID via other, hypothetical attacks.
